Class.name: p6.dt.Money
Class.Description:
The Money data type class represents a maney value.

Money is essentially the same as the %Numeric data type with clientdatatype of CURRENCY and a fixed SCALE of 2.

Method.name: DisplayToLogical
Method.Description:
Converts the input value %val, which is a string representing a currency value, into a logical currency value.

Returns the value of the input string %val as a currency (fixed point number).
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" if '(%val?.1""-"".N.1""."".1"","".N) set %objlasterror=$system.Status.Error(10000,""Номер введен неверно"")") i %parameter("VALUELIST")'="",%parameter("DISPLAYLIST")'="" d QUIT $$$OK . s sep=$e(%parameter("DISPLAYLIST")) . s len=$l(%parameter("DISPLAYLIST"),sep) . f i=2:1:$l(%parameter("DISPLAYLIST"),sep) $$$GENERATE(" q:%val="_$$quote($p(%parameter("DISPLAYLIST"),sep,i))_" "_$$quote($p(%parameter("VALUELIST"),sep,i))) . $$$GENERATE(" q """"") $$$GENERATE(" quit $in($tr(%val,"","","".""),"""_%parameter("FORMAT")_""","""")") QUIT $$$OK

Method.name: LogicalToDisplay
Method.Description:
Converts the value of %val, which is in currency FORMAT, into a display string.

Returns the FORMATted value of %val.
Method.Implementation:
s %code=0 i %parameter("VALUELIST")'="",%parameter("DISPLAYLIST")'="" d QUIT $$$OK . s sep=$e(%parameter("VALUELIST")) . s len=$l(%parameter("VALUELIST"),sep) . f i=2:1:$l(%parameter("VALUELIST"),sep) $$$GENERATE(" q:%val="_$$quote($p(%parameter("VALUELIST"),sep,i))_" "_$$quote($p(%parameter("DISPLAYLIST"),sep,i))) . $$$GENERATE(" q """"") s %codemode=$$$cMETHCODEMODEEXPRESSION
s temp=""""_%parameter("FORMAT")_"""" s temp=temp_",2" s %code="$s(%val="""":"""",1:$fn(%val,"_temp_"))" QUIT $$$OK
